certificates.title: Apple Pay Certificates (Deprecated)
certificates.textExisting:
We have updated our integration with Apple Pay, but since you already have it set up, you don't need to do anything just now.

However, when your Apple Pay certificates are about to expire, you can change to the new integration.

You can of course change to the new integration now, if you want, and then you don't have to worry about expiring certificates, changing integration, etc. in the future.
certificates.textAll: Before you activate Apple Pay, please make sure you have read our checklist.

paymentProcessingValid.true: The Payment Processing certificate is present and valid
paymentProcessingValid.false: The Payment Processing certificate is missing

paymentProcessingActive.true: The Payment Processing certificate is active
paymentProcessingActive.false: The Payment Processing certificate is inactive

merchantIdentificationValid.true: The Merchant Identification certificate is present
merchantIdentificationValid.false: The Merchant Identification certificate is missing

merchantIdentificationValidUntil.true: The Merchant Identification certificate is valid
merchantIdentificationValidUntil.false: The Merchant Identification certificate is expired and must be renewed

error.messageMissingCertificateFiles: The given certificate data for {type} is incomplete
